Author: aaroneous
Title: In late stage consumer markets, brand matters more than product

Author: mdakin
Content: "The human mind works at low efficiency. Twenty percent is the figure usually given. When, momentarily, there is a flash of greater power it is termed a hunch, or insight, or intuition." -Isaac Asimov
